docs.snippet: The former Dolphins lineman Andrew McDonald is the unidentified player named in an N.F.L.-commissioned report as being a victim of bullying in the Miami locker room....
docs.lead_paragraph: The former Dolphins lineman Andrew McDonald is the unidentified player named in an N.F.L.-commissioned report as being a victim of bullying in the Miami locker room.
docs.abstract: Former Miami Dolphins lineman Andrew McDonald is the unidentified player named in an NFL-commissioned report as being a victim of bullying in the Miami locker room.

docs.snippet: The lawyer Ted Wells’s report for the N.F.L. on the harassment by Richie Incognito and other Dolphins players contains a captivating portrait of Jonathan Martin’s anguish for not retaliating against his tormentors....
docs.lead_paragraph: The lawyer Ted Wells’s report for the N.F.L. on the harassment by Richie Incognito and other Dolphins players contains a captivating portrait of Jonathan Martin’s anguish for not retaliating against his tormentors.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column holds that lawyer Ted Wells’s report for the NFL on the harassment by Richie Incognito and other Miami Dolphins players contains a captivating portrait of Jonathan Martin’s anguish for not retaliating against his tormentors; it also paints a graphic and vile portrait of an NFL locker room that may shock even those familiar with the often lowbrow culture of men’s team sports.

headline.main: In Report on Bullying, the Vile and the Gripping
headline.print_headline: In Report on Bullying, the Vile and the Gripping
